reviewText: I almost bought this but luckily I double checked the ratio. They list is as 1.33:1  which is 4:3 standard. So if you prefer the picture to fit your regular television screen then this set is for you. If you would prefer to see the whole picture (or at least a lot more of it) then look for DVDs with a better ratio. For a definition and examples of different ratios check out this page on Wikipedia [...]

Three movies that are very watchable. I loved Shakespeare's in Love. Sure it was silly, but not boring or stale. It was definitely a new spin on an old story. If you are a fan of Gwyneth Paltrow like I am then you should enjoy these also. I experienced an instant feeling of satisfaction and appreciation which is so rare these days. Three films I was happy to add to my library.
